## R for ML in causal inference {.unnumbered}

The list of new R functions introduced in this *Machine learning in causal inference* lab component are below:

|   Function name | Package name | Use | Chapters |
|   -------- | -------- | -------- | -------- |
| ExtractSmd	| tableone	| To extract the standardized mean differences of a tableone object	| PSM with ML	| 
| listWrappers	| SuperLearner	| To see the list of wrapper functions, i.e., list of learners, in SuperLearner	| PSM with ML	|
| Match	| Matching	| To match an exposed/treated to M unexposed/controls	| PSM with ML	|
